title: Integrative Homeopathic Medicine - Berkeley, CA
description: Specialties: Reduce Pain Without Drugs or Surgery. My commitment is to help you recognize the potential for healing in aches and pains. By listening to your body, your thoughts and your feelings, healing is harnessed naturally and powerfully with my integrative medicine and coaching process. Solutions that address underlying issues offer the transformational power for deep healing. By using homeopathy, nutritional medicine and Integral Health Coaching, pain is reduced, wellness increased, clients flourish. My passion for natural healing and healthy living supports a greater understanding of self-care, allowing optimal access to your healthy body, mind and spirit. Professional referrals are common for me, physicians and coaches know that my unique blend of services offer a vital opportunity. Often my clients have tried conventional approaches without success; they are ready for a more holistic method guided by the principles of coaching, including awareness building, increased motivation, and improved behavioral changes. My tools include homeopathy, nutritional medicine, chiropractic and health coaching for deep cures of common and difficult conditions. Having treated several thousand patients, I know that you can succeed in your health and fitness goals and find a more resilient way of living. By listening to the wisdom of the body and accessing powerful natural cures, freedom from painfully limiting medical conditions is possible. Established in 1988. I learned much of what I know the hard way, I took a lot of antibiotics as a kid. I had ear infections and had to take big orange pills to get rid of them. For the rashes on my lips, I learned to carry around Neosporin. By the time I got to college, I started experiencing back pain. In graduate school, I noticed that taking pills made my infections go away but when stopped, soon the problems returned. While becoming a Chiropractor, I signed up for the a three year program in homeopathic medicine Homeopathy required learning to listen and wait, rather than look for quick fixes. I learned to be humble around the pain of illness and the success of healing. I grew comfortable with any form of illness and suffering. My own healing journey lead me from chiropractic, to homeopathy, to nutritional medicine then eventually to coaching in which I mastered my own laziness around care of myself. With 28 years of working with healing, I'm confident I can reduce pain and relieve suffering.
